channel.title: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King
channel.description:
I got an Idea for a Starting Neutral King:
**Neutral King**
You start with **2 targets Day 1**, If they both die, you die too
**Your goal:** End the game with at least 1 of them alive
**Same passives and day abilities**
**Night Abilities:**
**Guards:** Protect yourself or one of your targets - 3 Uses (Or maybe 4)
**Allies?:** Check 2 players, if they are of the same faction, you will know it, but it will not say which faction - 2 Uses
**If you step up as Neutral you have the Pretender King Goal, just survive.**

item.title: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I’d say the goal and abilities had nothing to do with the problem of Neutral king… his problem is he typically eats into the chance of a good king… and as far as goods are concerned a non good king is just a liability that should be eliminated asap.

Read full topic
item.source: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King

item.title: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
To be honest, I’d much prefer the 65% and 35% we have right now.

If anything changed, or even a new king was added, people would jump on the “Non cOnFiRmEd Kings Out”

I’d rather it be 65% and 35%, it’s a number that makes BD have a reason to not insta exe king for anything remotely suspicious, while giving a chance for an evil king to spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King

item.title: How I would re-add the Starting Neutral King

In this case you don’t care. You are trying to negate their coordination D1 as they rely on WKM and all of those other factors I mentioned
